summary: Provides a DGL‑based implementation of the Community Detection Graph Neural Network (CDGNN) model, including the network architecture that performs message‑passing on line‑graph representations and a training script that generates synthetic stochastic block model data, builds the hierarchical GNN, optimizes it, and evaluates community recovery using overlap scores.
business_intent: Offers a ready‑to‑run reference codebase for researchers and developers to experiment with graph‑neural‑network approaches to community detection, facilitating reproducible experiments and serving as a foundation for extending CDGNN methods in production or academic settings.
